Class ColumnsMap

java.lang.Object
krystal.framework.database.persistence.ColumnsMap
public class ColumnsMap extends Object
Use this builder to create a map of fields to columns if they have different names. Get a field using this.fld(fieldName) method. Use with ColumnsMapping as method returning this type or Enum implementing ColumnInterface, or Column directly on fields. In case of @Vertical class, the columns mapping for non-@Key fields becomes their name within Vertical.PivotColumn values.
See Also:
